description: Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM). This value set includes all UCUM codes
name: CommonUCUMCodesForDuration

text.div:
This value set includes all common UCUM codes used for Duraction - that it is, all commonly used units which have the same canonical unit as "a" (year)
